jhelp.gui.model

Class FontModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.model.FontModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String>, javax.swing.ComboBoxModel<java.lang.String>, javax.swing.ListModel<java.lang.String>

    public class FontModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ComboBoxModel<java.lang.String>, java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String>
    Model of system available font
    It can be use in JList and JComboBox

    Last modification : 12 mai 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
